content:
How would you format the article "Online Grocery Shopping: The New Reality" by John Smith into proper APA citations?
Assuming the article was published in the Journal of Online Shopping, the proper APA citation format would be:
Smith, J. (Year). Online grocery shopping: The new reality. Journal of Online Shopping, Volume(Issue), Page numbers.

To format the article "Online Grocery Shopping: The New Reality" by John Smith into a proper APA citation, you would need to have specific details such as the year of publication, volume number, issue number, and page numbers. Assuming you have these details, the citation would look like this:

Smith, J. (Year). Online grocery shopping: The new reality. *Journal of Online Shopping*, Volume(Issue), Page numbers.

For example, if the article was published in 2023, in volume 15, issue 3, on pages 45-60, the citation would be:

Smith, J. (2023). Online grocery shopping: The new reality. *Journal of Online Shopping*, 15(3), 45-60.
